name: The Death of Zoe
description:
The Death of Zoe, an adventure of stealth and exploration, full of small details in a world ruined by death and greed.

Zoe tells the story of a lemur who sacrificed everything to prevent great power from falling into the wrong hands.
Now, after his predicted death, you must go back to doing what was once your life and finish what you wanted to avoid, coming back to life

SEARCH, FIND AND AVOID

Look for the keys, avoid being seen and escape the traps that death has prepared for you.

Are you prepared to avoid your own death?
